name: mqtt-board
description: Client based on MQTT.js and Vue.js
author: Sergei Buntsevich <scarry92@yandex.ru>

scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && quasar build -m pwa && rm -rf deploy && mkdir deploy && cp -R dist/pwa-mat/* misc LICENSE package.json README.md deploy && node_modules/git-directory-deploy/bin/git-directory-deploy.sh -ddeploy -bgh-pages -rhttps://git.gurtam.net/flespi/frontend/mqtt-board.git && rm -rf deploy && git push github gh-pages
